column1: 12-MONTH CASH FLOW PROJECTOR - Business Now by Loud Legacy
Instructions: Project your cash flow for the next 12 months. Update monthly with actual figures.
Model three scenarios to prepare for uncertainty
Document your assumptions here so you can revisit them
1. Always maintain 3-6 months of expenses in cash reserve
2. Update projections monthly with actual figures
4. Review scenarios quarterly and adjust assumptions
5. Never let projected cash go below your minimum threshold
